text: Northfield is a village in Cook County, Illinois, United States. It is about north of downtown Chicago. As of the 2020 census, the village's population was 5,751. The headquarters of Kraft Foods used to be in Northfield."2009 Fact Sheet ." Kraft Foods. 6/7. Retrieved on January 30, 2011. "Corporate Offices Kraft Foods Inc. Three Lakes Drive Northfield, IL 60093" == References == Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
title: Northfield, Illinois
